ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: For those interested in OB literature and want an overview course on the major themes.
I would recommend this course to any graduate student that is interested in understand the historical and contemporary debates in the organizations literature.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Provided a solid foundation of theory to work off of and think through for future research. Could be a little more heavy on the methods but understandably hard to accommodate during each session.

This course deepened my knowledge in truly incalculable ways. Beyond just organizations, this class helped me think through methods, research design and sociokofy more generally. It provided me the opportunity to compose the beginnings of what will turn out to be my second year paper, and potentially my dissertation.
